info-screen-text-two.fin: Tavoitteena on koota palapeli kokonaiseksi mahdollisimman nopeasti.
info-screen-text-two.eng: The goal is to assemble the puzzle as quickly as possible.

info-screen-text-three.fin: Peli on jaettu kolmeen eri vaikeustasoon: Helppo, Keskitaso ja Vaikea.
info-screen-text-three.eng: The game is divided into three different difficulty levels: Easy, Medium and Hard.

info-screen-text-four.fin: Valitse haluamasi vaikeustaso ja aloita pelaaminen!
info-screen-text-four.eng: Choose your desired difficulty and start playing!

end-screen-author.fin: Tekijät: Gradian opiskelijat Niklas Virtanen ja Tomas Räsälä
end-screen-author.eng: Authors: Gradia students Niklas Virtanen and Tomas Räsälä

motive-screen-text-one.fin: Halusimme tehdä palapeli pelin kaikenikäisille, jotta kaikki voivat oppia suomea ja suomen historiaa hauskalla tavalla.
motive-screen-text-one.eng: We wanted to create a jigsaw game for people of all ages, so everyone can learn finnish and finnish history in a fun way.

motive-screen-text-two.fin: Palapeli antaa hyvän tavan oppia suomea ja pitää hauskaa samalla aikaa.
motive-screen-text-two.eng: Jigsaw games give a good way to learn finnish and have fun simultaneously.

motive-screen-text-three.fin: Peli on tehty vuonna 2024 Gradian opiskelijoiden toimesta. Pelin teko kesti vähän alle kuukauden.
motive-screen-text-three.eng: The game was made in 2024 by Gradia students. The making of the game took a little under a month.

game-info-screen-text-two.fin: Tavoitteena on koota palapeli kokonaiseksi mahdollisimman nopeasti.
game-info-screen-text-two.eng: The goal is to assemble the puzzle as quickly as possible.

game-info-screen-text-three.fin: Peli on jaettu kolmeen eri vaikeustasoon: Helppo, Keskitaso ja Vaikea.
game-info-screen-text-three.eng: The game is divided into three different difficulty levels: Easy, Medium and Hard.

game-info-screen-text-four.fin: Valitse haluamasi vaikeustaso ja aloita pelaaminen!
game-info-screen-text-four.eng: Choose your desired difficulty and start playing!
